Synchronoss Insights Platform

SIP Web SIP web application
Grafana Visualization of monitoring of hosts and services
Prometheus Monitoring and alerting of hosts and services
HAProxy statistics High availability proxy statistics
Proxy auto-config Proxy configuration for browser to access internal SIP resources below
Livy console Spark job REST API
YARN RM Resource Manager
MapR console MapR Control System (credentials: mapr/mapr)
Elasticsearch Elasticsearch
System logs SIP services logs (single page)
SIP documentation See the SIP Operations Guide, Design Guide and Developer Guide for more information on the platform
